data.message: Hello Facebook... If I unfollow them will we still be friends?

replies.message: Hey Bridgette. If you unfollow someone you will no longer see their posts in your News Feed but you will still be friends. Keep in mind your friends won't know if you've chosen to unfollow them. Thanks for reaching out! -Kristin
will they still see your posts?

Thanks for reaching out, Mark. If you've been tagged in a post and want to remove it, you have the option to untag yourself. You can see step-by-step instructions on how to remove a tag here: http://on.fb.me/1M3mCsk. Hope this helps! -Kate

Hi there, Ina. Friends that you unfollow will still be able to see your posts. If you'd like to limit what they see, you can add them to a restricted list. Learn more here: http://on.fb.me/1M3F1VX. We hope this clarifies! -Rey
